pages.text: A new set of generators that generate Forge Energy based on ambiental situations

pages.title: Ferricore Solar Panel
pages.text: Default Max FE rate: $(br)$(bold)240$()$(br)$(bold)Default Conditions:$() $(li) Dimensions = Overworld $(li) See sky = true $(li) Day time = true

pages.title: BlazeGold Solar Panel
pages.text: Default Max FE rate: $(br)$(bold)960$()$(br)$(bold)Default Conditions:$() $(li) Dimensions = Nether

pages.title: Celestigem Solar Panel
pages.text: Default Max FE rate: $(br)$(bold)3840$()$(br)$(bold)Default Conditions:$() $(li) See sky = true$(li) More solar panels are near to other more will produce

$(bold)Default Conditions:$()$(li) More solar panels are near to other more will produce$(li) High/Low Y-level will increase the multiplier , middle Y-level will decrease the multiplier$(br2)$(bold)Note$(): Everything can be modified via configs so dont trust at all!
